description:
Amazon will harness computer vision and AI to ensure customers receive products in pristine condition and further its sustainability efforts. The initiative – dubbed “Project P.I.” (short for “private investigator”) – operates within Amazon fulfilment centres across North America, where it will scan millions of products daily for defects. Project P.I. leverages generative AI and... Read more »

The post Amazon will use computer vision to spot defects before dispatch appeared first on AI News.
title: Amazon will use computer vision to spot defects before dispatch
